Hi. If you're viewing this then you either don't have JavaScript enabled or you're using such an old browser that it's not compatible with a lot of my website.

While I understand the importance of backwards compatibility and having a website that works without JavaScript, I use GitHub pages for my hosting. While GitHub is great, with better uptime than GoDaddy, great support, and an easy-to-use CLI, it only supports static HTML pages. This means that all my dynamic content really has to be done via JavaScript.

So, in order to have, say, my photo gallery work, I need JavaScript. All lazy loading and such is JavaScript. I try my best to make the website fast and as compatible as possible, but unfortunately a lot is out of my control.

Home

Thanks,

{{site.author.name}}
